++ SCP Book Club

> [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGXW8727iSrXfz_PbzDYc0p96_LUVZOOH SCP Book Club] is a weekly[[footnote]] aka whatever weeks i feel like it [[/footnote]] livestream series where I delve into various SCP Articles, Tales, Canons, and GOIs, in an effort to analyze them through a lens of literary analysis.
author: WhoIsCthulhu
